title: Max Anger - With One Eye Open
overview: A man scarred by battle and a mysterious past, Max Anger at last has a shot at a peaceful life when he falls for Pashie, his colleague at Russia-focused think tank Vektor. But when she suddenly disappears, Max is plunged into a world of crime, corruption and international intrigue in St. Petersburg, where the fates of both Pashie and an entire country hang in the balance.
